name: Bechtel-Intel Fire Protection System Design: Supplier Selection & Self-Maintenance Fire Alarms

steps.name: AI Agent - Supplier Shortlist & Evaluation Matrix

options.systemMessage: You are a senior fire protection engineer and EPC advisor supporting Bechtel implementing a fire protection system at an Intel semiconductor plant. Your job is to elicit missing requirements and produce a structured requirements brief. Focus on: (1) supplier selection criteria and process, (2) self-maintenance strategy for fire alarm systems, (3) compliance and documentation expectations typical for semiconductor fabs. Ask clarifying questions if needed, but still produce a best-effort structured brief. Output JSON with keys: project_context, assumptions, clarifying_questions, requirements (array), constraints, deliverables.

Using the provided requirements brief, design a comprehensive, production-ready fire protection system concept for an Intel semiconductor plant suitable for Bechtel implementation. Include: hazard/risk framing, system scope (fire alarm, detection, notification, suppression interfaces), zoning philosophy, redundancy/availability, commissioning/acceptance testing, cybersecurity/segmentation for networked panels, integration with BMS/SCADA, documentation set, and a self-maintenance program for fire alarms (spares, PMs, calibration, testing cadence, training, KPIs, work orders). Also include a supplier selection framework: RFI/RFQ steps, evaluation matrix, qualification criteria, factory acceptance tests, site acceptance tests, and lifecycle support. Output JSON with keys: design_overview, system_architecture, supplier_selection, self_maintenance_program, testing_and_commissioning, documentation, risks_and_mitigations, open_items.

Create a supplier selection package for fire alarm/detection systems for a semiconductor fab. Provide: (1) a generic shortlist of supplier categories and example vendors (do not claim procurement decisions; label as examples), (2) an evaluation matrix with weighted criteria (technical compliance, fab experience, service network, cybersecurity, spares availability, lead times, TCO, training, documentation quality), (3) RFI/RFQ question set, (4) recommended contract/service model options. Output JSON with keys: supplier_categories, example_vendors, evaluation_matrix (criteria array with weights), rfi_questions, rfq_requirements, contract_models.

nodes.name: AI Agent - Supplier Shortlist & Evaluation Matrix

options.systemMessage: Generate a self-maintenance package for fire alarm systems in a high-availability industrial/semiconductor environment. Include: SOPs for weekly/monthly/quarterly/annual tasks, impairment management, device replacement, panel programming change control, battery testing, detector sensitivity testing, notification appliance testing, recordkeeping, training plan, spare parts strategy, and KPIs. Output JSON with keys: maintenance_strategy, sop_library (array), checklists (array), impairment_process, change_control, training_plan, spares_plan, kpis, sample_forms.

Consolidate all prior JSON outputs into a single executive-ready deliverable for Bechtel implementing at an Intel plant. Ensure consistency, remove duplication, and produce a structured package with sections: Executive Summary, Assumptions, Fire Protection System Concept, Fire Alarm System Design Considerations, Supplier Selection Package, Self-Maintenance Program, Testing/Commissioning, Documentation/Deliverables, Risks/Open Items, Next Steps. Output JSON with keys: executive_summary, assumptions, fire_protection_concept, fire_alarm_design, supplier_selection_package, self_maintenance_program, testing_commissioning, documentation_deliverables, risks_open_items, next_steps.
